What magazine published the '200 Greatest Singers of All Time' list?
Rolling Stone
Which singer's fans protested outside Rolling Stone's office?
Celine Dion
What sparked the outrage that led to the protest?
Celine Dion being excluded from the '200 Greatest Singers of All Time' list
Which other notable artists were excluded from the list?
Andrea Bocelli, Janet Jackson, Madonna, Cher, Nat King Cole, and Judy Garland
Where is Rolling Stone's office located?
New York
When was the list published?
New Year's Day
How many Grammy Awards has Celine Dion won?
Five
How many albums has Celine Dion sold worldwide throughout her career?
More than 250 million
How many Celine Dion fans were part of the group of protesters?
Around 15
Where did the group of protesters travel from?
Montreal
